title: Claude Opus 4.6 Finds 500+ High-Severity Flaws Across Major Open-Source Libraries
description: Artificial intelligence (AI) company Anthropic revealed that its latest large language model (LLM), Claude Opus 4.6, has found more than 500 previously unknown high-severity security flaws in open-source libraries, including Ghostscript, OpenSC, and CGIF.
